S.name: Sites related to a keyword(s)
S.description: Tools for finding websites related to specific keywords or search terms.

O.name: Onions sites related to keyword(s)
O.description: Tools for discovering .onion sites related to specific keywords or search terms.

ST.name: Onion site status
ST.description: Tools for checking the status and availability of .onion sites.

CTI.name: Cyber Threat Intelligence
CTI.description: Platforms created or optimized for performing OSINT specifically for threat intelligence purposes.

OS.name: Onion services directory
OS.description: Tools and directories listing notable onion services and hidden services.

R.name: Tor relay history
R.description: Tools for checking whether a given IP address was used as a Tor relay during a specific time period.

SCDE.name: Scraping, Crawling and Advanced Data Extraction
SCDE.description: Tools for crawling websites, extracting emails, metadata, keywords, titles, HTML code, hostnames, IP addresses, and taking screenshots from onion or standard sites.

IS.name: Infrastructure and Security Analysis
IS.description: Tools for identifying web servers, SSH, SMTP, FTP information, versions, crypto wallets, vulnerabilities, and other operational security issues on onion sites.
